official-title.#text: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to repeal the increase in the income threshold used in determining the deduction for medical care.

sponsor.#tail: introduced the following bill; which was referred to the

short-title.#text: Helping Families and Seniors Save on Health Care Act of 2013

text.#text: This Act may be cited as the

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: (and the amendments made by such section) are hereby repealed, and the
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text: Section 9013 of the Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act/s:9013

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: shall be applied and administered as if such section (and amendments) had not been enacted.

header.#text: Repeal of increase in income threshold for determining medical care deduction

{http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/}title.#text: 113 HR 3114 IH: Helping Families and Seniors Save on Health Care Act of 2013
